name: Ava (itch) (Piers Reed, Dan Ryan)
description:
Enriched by its unique, hand-painted art style, Ava is a 2D platformer that explores the concept of mortality and loss. Swing, smash and explore your way through the ruins of Istehro as princess Ava.

Buried deep in The Royal Crypt, Ava awakens to find her Kingdom has fallen in to complete ruin. Ava must uncover the remnants of her memory to save her family and restore Istehro to its former glory.

  • Non linear exploration Inspired by metroidvania classics
  • Orchestrated OST that evolves as you progress 
  • A narrative driven world  with charming characters
  • Speed run friendly controls

Dualshock 4

Move - Joystick/D-pad

Jump - X

Grapple - R2

Interact - D-pad Up

Green Barrier - Triangle

Pink Barrier - Square

Orange Barrier - Circle

Keyboard

Move - WASD/Directional Keys

Jump - Spacebar

Grapple - Left Shift

Interact - Up Key

Green Barrier - J

Pink Barrier - L

Orange Barrier - K

This is an early demo. Please leave feedback in the comments below and help us make Ava even better!
